text: Mkulu Nguluwi Yawele na Mong'ho kanguwalonjela hino hemwe watambika mlingumbeza, “Mwana kangumhulichizaga mhaza wa heye na chitumagwa kangumdumbaga mkulu wa heye. Wone heni nda mhaza wa hemwe, lekachoni hamlingunyhulichiza? Wone heni nda Mkulu wa hemwe, lekachoni hamlingundumba? Mwanguuza, ‘Natukubeza ndaze?’
